channel.title: Ten Years On: RPGs of 2012: 46-60
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I wrap up my series looking at the all the ttrpgs published in 2012: *Primeval* to *Psi*Run*, *Star Wars: Edge of the Empire* to *Svavelvinter*, *The Final Girl* to *Witch: The Road to Lindisfarne*, and beyond. Plus links to the first three installments. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/ten-years-on-rpgs-of-2012-46-60

item.title: Ten Years On: RPGs of 2012: 46-60
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog I wrap up my series looking at the all the ttrpgs published in 2012: Primeval to PsiRun*, Star Wars: Edge of the Empire to Svavelvinter, The Final Girl to Witch: The Road to Lindisfarne, and beyond. Plus links to the first three installments.

THE GAUNTLET

Ten Years On: RPGs of 2012: 46-60

This is the last part of my series looking back at ttrpgs released in 2012.  You can find the first part here.  The second part is here . The third part is here . 

Read full topic
